title: A new Yasuo Skin (because he needs one IMO)
body:
I'm no good at art, so sorry I have no drawing to accompany this.

I was thinking along the lines of some sort of Storm/lightning themed skin

Some sort of Shockblade Zed vibe

His eyes could be white kinda like Storm for X-men(it would look bad ass)

His hair should be white, and sorta spiky, not grey, he shouldn't look old.

His sword should be covered in lightning, i'll attach an image, don't know how to embed it on these boards
[I think it should be less blue](http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140205093519/narutoprofile/images/3/38/Cloud_lightning.jpg)

His rope belt should be dark gray,

His right arm should be covered in lightning, getting less bright as it goes up his arm, brightest at the tip of his sword

His scarf should be dark gray as well, and the rest of his clothes should be white, except for all the straps n stuff, those could be either gray or lightning, depending on how in depth you guys wanna go.

I think this skin would look amazing, and I think it would sell.

If anyone who sees this wants to draw it out to help visualize that would be awesome, and I would put it up here in the main post for ya.

replies.body: It's a good concept, but he just got PROJECT, so it's unlikely to happen anytime soon...
I agree he needs a skin, and this idea seems great.
Good but not likely to happen..Talon imo needs a skin, maybe that ravenborn, nighthunter, or project talon would be nice
Yeh, talon also needs a skin, maybe one to look like MJ, would make his dance way better
That looks like star wars master yi skin.
